sourcesContent:
import styles from './cart.module.scss' import store from 'store' import { LeftIcon } from 'assets/svgs' interface SearchStructure { authors: string[] contents: string datetime: string isbn: string price: number publisher: string sale_price: number status: string thumbnail: string title: string translators: any[] url: string } const Cart = () => { const storeData = store.get('cartStore') const price = storeData .map((item: SearchStructure) => item.price) .reduce((prev: number, curr: number) => prev + curr, 0) const onLogoClick = (e: MouseEvent) => { const { value } = e.currentTarget.dataset if (value === 'logo') navigate('/') else if (value === 'cart') navigate('/cart') else navigate('/user') } return (

장바구니

    {storeData.map((item: SearchStructure) => (
  • {item.title}
    {item.authors}
    {item.price}원
    • ))}
  • 총 상품 수
    {storeData.length}개
  • 총 상품 금액
    {price}원
  • 총 배송비
    얼마
  • 총 결제 예상 금액
    {price}원
) } export default Cart
